metadata.title: AKS Egress to Suspicious IP
metadata.description: Detects outbound connections to known malicious or suspicious IP addresses.

properties.displayName: AKS Egress to Threat Intelligence IP
properties.description: Detects outbound network connections from AKS pods to IP addresses in threat intelligence feeds.
properties.query:
let TIIndicators = ThreatIntelligenceIndicator
| where TimeGenerated > ago(14d)
| where isnotempty(NetworkIP) or isnotempty(NetworkDestinationIP)
| extend TI_IP = coalesce(NetworkIP, NetworkDestinationIP)
| where Active == true
| summarize LatestIndicator = arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by TI_IP
| project TI_IP, Description, ThreatType, ConfidenceScore, ExpirationDateTime;
AzureNetworkAnalytics_CL
| where TimeGenerated > ago(5m)
| where SubType_s == "FlowLog"
| where FlowDirection_s == "O" // Outbound
| extend
    SourceIP = SrcIP_s,
    DestinationIP = DestIP_s,
    DestinationPort = DestPort_d,
    Protocol = L4Protocol_s,
    BytesSent = OutboundBytes_d,
    FlowStatus = FlowStatus_s
| where isnotempty(DestinationIP)
| join kind=inner (TIIndicators) on $left.DestinationIP == $right.TI_IP
| extend
    ClusterName = Resource,
    ThreatDescription = Description,
    ThreatConfidence = ConfidenceScore
| project
    TimeGenerated,
    ClusterName,
    SourceIP,
    DestinationIP,
    DestinationPort,
    Protocol,
    BytesSent,
    ThreatType,
    ThreatDescription,
    ThreatConfidence
| summarize
    FirstSeen = min(TimeGenerated),
    LastSeen = max(TimeGenerated),
    ConnectionCount = count(),
    TotalBytesSent = sum(BytesSent),
    Ports = make_set(DestinationPort, 20)
    by ClusterName, SourceIP, DestinationIP, ThreatType, ThreatDescription

alertDetailsOverride.alertDescriptionFormat: Detected {{ConnectionCount}} connections from {{SourceIP}} to known malicious IP {{DestinationIP}} ({{ThreatType}}). {{TotalBytesSent}} bytes transferred.
